response.overview: Through a montage in “BitterSuite,” Hazel and Ruby, friends before college, start a new journey together as roommates in college. As they settle into campus life, new friendships, and challenges, they subtly begin to grow apart leaving the girls to confront the “bittersweet” reality of change.
response.tagline: Hazel and Ruby settle into campus life, new friendships, and challenges, they subtly begin to grow apart leaving the girls to confront the “bittersweet” reality of change.
response.title: Bittersuite
